query: hotels for families with kids in Miami
title: Amazing hotels for families with kids in Miami
excerpt: Finding the perfect hotel for a family vacation can be a daunting task, especially in a bustling city like Miami where options abound. This list is valuable because it highlights family-friendly hotels that not only cater to the needs of children but also provide comfort and convenience for parents, ensuring a memorable experience for everyone. With amenities designed for kids and activities that engage the whole family, these hotels make vacation planning a breeze.
intro: Discover the best family-friendly hotels in Miami that offer fun, comfort, and unforgettable experiences for both kids and parents.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami
hotels.description: Discover the epitome of luxury at The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami, where spacious suites feature separate living areas and private balconies, complemented by marble bathrooms for a truly indulgent stay. Delight your palate with oceanfront dining at Lightkeepers and savor Cuban-inspired dishes at Rumbar, all set in a stunning ambiance. Enhance your relaxation with an expansive 25,000 square feet spa, outdoor pools, and tennis courts, making it the perfect destination for both rejuvenation and recreation.
hotels.highlight: Features kids meals, an outdoor pool, and a playground for family-friendly enjoyment and relaxation.

hotels.name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
hotels.description: Embassy Suites Miami International Airport offers complimentary shuttle services to and from the airport, ensuring a hassle-free travel experience. Guests can relax by the inviting outdoor pool or indulge in the hot tub, soaking up the Miami sun. Each room is thoughtfully equipped with amenities like a microwave and refrigerator, providing all the comforts of home for a delightful stay.
hotels.highlight: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport offers family rooms, an outdoor pool, and a hot tub for enjoyable relaxation.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Miami-Doral Area, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: Discover a perfect blend of comfort and convenience at the Holiday Inn Hotel Miami-Doral Area, where you can unwind by the outdoor pool and enjoy complimentary WiFi. Stay active at the 24-hour fitness center and savor delicious meals at Changes Cafe or the Bar & Grille Buffet. Relax in cozy guestrooms equipped with coffee-making facilities and flat-screen TVs, all while being just minutes away from popular shopping destinations like Dolphin Mall and Miami International Mall.
hotels.highlight: Boasts family rooms, a heated pool, and kids meals, ensuring a comfortable stay for families in Miami.

hotels.name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall
hotels.description: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall offers a blend of comfort and convenience with amenities like an outdoor pool, fitness center, and on-site dining. Enjoy modern rooms featuring allergy-free options, flat-screen TVs, and coffee machines, alongside 24-hour room service and complimentary WiFi. Located near Dolphin Mall and Miami International Airport, this hotel is ideal for both leisure and business travelers, with fun activities like mini-golf and a business center available.
hotels.highlight: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall includes family rooms, an outdoor pool, and mini-golf for enjoyable family activities.

hotels.name: Sonesta Simply Suites Miami Airport Doral
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate comfort at Sonesta Simply Suites Miami Airport Doral, where each luxurious suite features a fully equipped kitchen, ideal for both extended stays and quick getaways. Guests can take advantage of convenient amenities including high-speed internet, an outdoor heated pool, and a 24-hour fitness center, ensuring a relaxing and enjoyable stay. With prime access to Miami's vibrant attractions such as South Beach and Bayside Marketplace, your adventure in this dynamic city awaits.
hotels.highlight: Offers family rooms, a heated pool, and BBQ facilities for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Express Miami Airport Doral Area, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: Experience convenience and comfort at Holiday Inn Express Miami Airport Doral Area, located just 9 miles from Miami International Airport. Enjoy modern guest rooms equipped with essential amenities, a heated outdoor pool, and a complimentary breakfast buffet to kickstart your day. With a fitness center and a 24-hour business center, this hotel caters to both leisure and business travelers, plus it's just minutes away from Doral Country Club for golf enthusiasts.
hotels.highlight: Offers family rooms, a heated outdoor pool, and complimentary breakfast for an enjoyable stay in Miami.
